TypeSignature.Value: public interface ISecureRandomParameters : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ISecureRandomParameters implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type ISecureRandomParameters = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: A marker interface for parameters used in various SecureRandom methods.

remarks.para: A marker interface for parameters used in various SecureRandom methods.
Some SecureRandom implementations might require additional operational parameters. Objects of classes which implement this interface can be passed to those implementations that support them.
